sponsor: Naurex, Inc, an affiliate of Allergan plc
briefTitle: Long-term Safety Study of Rapastinel as Adjunctive Therapy in Patients With Major Depressive Disorder
officialTitle: An Open-label, Long-term Safety Study of Rapastinel as Adjunctive Therapy in Patients With Major Depressive Disorder
summary: This study will evaluate the long-term safety and tolerability of rapastinel as an adjunctive to antidepressant therapy (ADT) in patients with major depressive disorder (MDD).

primaryOutcome.measure: The Number of Participants With Treatment-Emergent Adverse Events (TEAEs)
